title: Jujutsu kaisen (Hindi Dubbed)
description: Jujutsu Kaisen is a dark fantasy series that follows high school student Yuji Itadori, who joins a secret society of sorcerers to combat monstrous spiritual entities called "Curses," born from negative human emotions.

title: Chainsaw Man(Hindi Dubbed)
description: Chainsaw Man is a dark fantasy, action-comedy series that follows the story of an impoverished young man named Denji who merges with his pet devil-dog, Pochita, to become a devil-human hybrid with chainsaws for a head and arms. He is then recruited by a government agency to hunt down powerful devils.
